name: df-grpo
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cgr, cab(s0, wex(s1, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cxp(cv(s1), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wceq(co(co(cv(s2), cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s0), cv(s4)), co(cv(s2), cv(s0), co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s4))))))), wrex(s5, cv(s1), wral(s2, cv(s1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s5), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s2)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s0), cv(s2)), cv(s5))))))))))
comment: Define the class of all group operations. The base set for a group can be determined from its group operation. Based on the definition in Exercise 28 of [Herstein] p. 54. (Contributed by NM, 10-Oct-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
